S02psarkdhu:1: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
S02psarkdhu:2: namo bhagavate śākyamunaye mahākāruṇikāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya /
S02psarkdhu:4_0: oṃ giri giri giriṇi giriṇi girivati guṇavati ākāśavati ākāśaviśuddhe sarvapāpavigate
S02psarkdhu:4_1: ākāśe gaganatale ākāśavicāriṇi maṇidhari vajriṇi jvalitaśikhare maṇimuktākhacitamaulidhare
S02psarkdhu:4_2: sukeśe suveṣe suvaktre sunetre suvarṇagaure atīte anutpanne anāgate pratyutpanne
S02psarkdhu:4_3: namaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ jvalitaujasāṃ buddhe subuddhe bhagavati surakṣaṇi akṣaya sukṣaya
S02psarkdhu:4_4: sūkṣme suprabhe sudame sudānte suvrate varade pravare bhagavati bhadravati subhadravati
S02psarkdhu:4_5: bhadre subhadre vimale jayabhadre caṇḍi pracaṇḍi caṇḍe vajracaṇḍe mahācaṇḍe gauri
S02psarkdhu:4_6: gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi vaccasi sumati pukkasi sumukhi śabari śāvari śaṃkari dramaṇḍi
S02psarkdhu:4_7: drāmaṇḍi raudriṇi sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani hana hana sarvaśatrūn daha daha
S02psarkdhu:4_9: jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahāṇāṃ nāśaya naśaya sarvapāpāni me bhagavati /
S02psarkdhu:5: rakṣa rakṣa mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvatra sarvadā sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ /
S02psarkdhu:7_0: sarvakilviṣanāśani mārtaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍe mṛtyudaṇḍanivāriṇi mānande mānini mahāmānini
S02psarkdhu:7_1: mānadhāriṇi cale vicale vimale viṭi viṭi taṭi tiṭi niṭi niṭi tuṭṭe dhoriṇi dhariṇi
S02psarkdhu:7_2: nimiṇi viriṇi vīryaṇi pracale pravarasamare caṇḍāli mātaṅgi rundhasi karasi śarasi
S02psarkdhu:7_3: varcasi sumati pukkasi śabari śabari śaṃkari mani draviḍi ḍāviḍi hanani dahani pacani
S02psarkdhu:7_4: pācani marddani sarali sarale saralambhe hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavidāriṇi mahiri mahiri mahāmahili
S02psarkdhu:7_5: nigaḍe nigaḍabhaṃje marte marte matti mattini dāṃte cakre cakravākini jvale jvale
S02psarkdhu:7_6: jvalini śabari śābari sarvavyādhihariṇi muni muni cuṇḍi cuṇḍi cuṇḍini cuṇḍini mahācuṇḍini
S02psarkdhu:7_7: nimi nimi nimiṃdhari trailokyavardhani trilokajanani trilokālokakari traidhātukavyavalokani
S02psarkdhu:7_9: māṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca sarvasthānagata sarvaduṣṭabhayebhyaḥ sarvamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhayebhyaḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ /
S02psarkdhu:8: vajre vajre vajravati vajradhare vajrapāṇidhare hiri hiri mili mili kili kili cili cili śili śili cala cala vala vala varade [Pkdh_142] varadāṃkuśe sarvatra jayalabdhe svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:13: svasti bhavatu mama sarvasattvānāñ ca svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:19: oṃ jayatu jayavati jayakamale vimale svāhā /
S02psarkdhu:23: oṃ bhuḥ bhūri bhūri vajravati sarvatathāgatahṛdayapūraṇi āyuḥsandhāraṇi bale balavati /
S02psarkdhu:25: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi hūm hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
S02psarkdhu:26: oṃ maṇivajre hṛdayavajre mārasainyavidrāvaṇi hana hana sarvaśatrūn vajragarbhe trāsaya trāsaya sarvamārabhavanāni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ saṃbhara saṃbhara svāhā /
